entry.title: New release for Docker Controller Bot: v2.5.0
entry.content:
[NEW] Multiple administrators: It is now possible to add multiple administrators by simply concatenating TELEGRAM_ADMIN=12345,54321,98766,13234 with comma , . [NEW] Notification channel: A separate channel for container status updates with the TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL variable. [FIX] Now the /changetag command will work for the Docker-Controller-Bot (be careful with reverting to a version before 2.5.0 as in previous versions it always downloaded the latest one). [FIX] Now in the /compose command the labels are shown. [FIX] The image will occupy again what it should occupy (it will not occupy 1GB but around 80MB).

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgongut/docker-controller-bot/compare/v2.4.0...v2.5.0
